C

com.github.skopylov58.retry - package com.github.skopylov58.retry
This package provides interface to perform non-blocking asynchronous retry operations on supplier that may throw an exception.

Factory method to creates Retry.Worker for the exceptional supplier.

R

retry() - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
Starts retry forever operation.
retry(long) - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
Retry with maximum number of tries
Retry - Interface in com.github.skopylov58.retry
Interface to perform asynchronous retry operations on supplier that may throw an exception.
Retry.CheckedSupplier<T> - Interface in com.github.skopylov58.retry
Supplier that may throw an exception.
Retry.Worker<T> - Class in com.github.skopylov58.retry
Retry worker, class that actually performs asynchronous retries.
retryOnException(Predicate<Throwable>) - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
Specifies which exception(s) to retry.
retryOnValue(Predicate<T>) - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
Allows retry on some specific return values, like "Service not available", null values, etc.

S

sneakyThrow(Throwable) - Static method in interface com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry
 

W

withBackoff(Function<Long, Duration>) - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
With backoff function you can implement different retry delay strategies - linear, exponential, fibonacci, etc.
withExecutor(Executor) - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
Specifies executor to perform retries.
withFixedDelay(Duration) - Method in class com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker
Specifies backoff retry strategy with fixed delay.
